name: Mabel vs. Forces of Hell DEMO
name_original: Mabel vs. Forces of Hell DEMO
description:
You must save the city… even if you have to destroy it! 

Play as Mabel, a sweet old lady who spends her days in a nursing home.

The forces of hell have opened gates to the world of humans. Doctors and nurses have turned into monsters and demons, and the elderly of the nursing home have taken advantage of the confusion to flee.

Only Mabel, with her 'Kill-o-Matic 20,000' rifle, can rescue them and take down the horde of monsters, skeletons and demonic nurses.

(The demo only includes the first level and may lack some features).

Features
  • 10 types of shooting.
  • Destroy the scenario… and pay for it!
  • Several enemies, each with their own behavior.
  • Old Arcade gameplay.
  • An evil and bloodthirsty final boss with two attack modes.
  • The best graphics of 1991… in 2021!
Buttons (Keyboard):
  • Arrows – Movement
  • Z – Fire
  • X – Dash
  • C – Special Attack
  • Tab – Pause/Menu
